statements: SELECT * FROM player_performance_metrics ORDER BY player_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE kill_death_ratio > 1.5
SELECT player_name, accuracy FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE win_loss_ratio < 1.0 ORDER BY accuracy ASC
SELECT player_id, kill_death_ratio FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE accuracy BETWEEN 0.7 AND 0.9
SELECT * FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT player_name, kill_death_ratio FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT player_id, player_name, win_loss_ratio FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE kill_death_ratio < 1.0;
SELECT player_name, accuracy, win_loss_ratio FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE win_loss_ratio BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT AVG(accuracy) AS average_accuracy, MAX(win_loss_ratio) AS max_win_loss FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM PlayerMetrics;
SELECT player_id, kill_death_ratio, accuracy FROM PlayerMetrics WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT player_id, win_loss_ratio FROM PlayerMetrics WHERE accuracy > 75;
SELECT player_id, kill_death_ratio, accuracy, win_loss_ratio FROM PlayerMetrics ORDER BY win_loss_ratio ASC;
SELECT * FROM MatchResults WHERE win = 1 ORDER BY kills DESC, deaths ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerMetrics WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY kill_death_ratio DESC;
SELECT player_id, win_loss_ratio FROM PlayerMetrics WHERE accuracy > 80 ORDER BY win_loss_ratio ASC, accuracy DESC;
SELECT AVG(kills) AS avg_kills, AVG(deaths) AS avg_deaths FROM MatchResults GROUP BY player_id HAVING avg_kills > 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(kills) AS total_kills, SUM(deaths) AS total_deaths FROM MatchResults GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_kills DESC;
SELECT player_id, win_loss_ratio, ROUND(win_loss_ratio * 100) AS win_ratio_percentage FROM PlayerMetrics WHERE win_loss_ratio < 1;
SELECT * FROM PlayerMetrics WHERE kill_death_ratio > 1.5 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE level >= 10 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT player_id, kill_death_ratio, accuracy, win_loss_ratio FROM PlayerMetrics JOIN PlayerProfiles ON PlayerMetrics.player_id = PlayerProfiles.player_id WHERE PlayerProfiles.username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT player_id, username, win_loss_ratio FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE experience < 1000;
SELECT match_id, result, time_played FROM MatchHistory ORDER BY time_played DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PlayerMetrics WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, kill_death_ratio, accuracy FROM PlayerMetrics ORDER BY kill_death_ratio DESC
SELECT * FROM MatchHistory WHERE result = 'Win' AND player_id = 2
SELECT player_id, username, level FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE level > 10
SELECT player_id, experience FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE experience BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, kill_death_ratio, accuracy FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, skill_type, skill_value FROM player_skills ORDER BY skill_value DESC;
SELECT player_id, win_loss_ratio, kill_death_ratio FROM player_stats WHERE win_loss_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT player_id, game_date, game_mode, game_result FROM player_history WHERE game_mode = 'Team Deathmatch';
SELECT * FROM player_stats ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, kill_death_ratio, accuracy FROM player_stats WHERE win_loss_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT player_id, skill_type, skill_value FROM player_skills WHERE skill_type = 'shooting' ORDER BY skill_value DESC;
SELECT ph.player_id, ph.game_date, pr.result FROM player_history ph INNER JOIN match_results pr ON ph.player_id = pr.player_id WHERE ph.game_mode = 'Ranked Match' AND ph.game_result = 'Win';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players, AVG(skill_value) AS avg_skill_value, MAX(skill_value) AS max_skill_value FROM player_skills;
SELECT player_id, player_name, kill_death_ratio FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, win_loss_ratio, accuracy FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, kill_death_ratio, win_loss_ratio FROM player_stats WHERE win_loss_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT player_id, player_name, kill_death_ratio, accuracy, win_loss_ratio FROM player_stats ORDER BY kill_death_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM weapon_stats WHERE damage_per_shot > 50;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_name, kill_death_ratio FROM player_stats WHERE win_loss_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT player_name, match_date, winner FROM match_history JOIN player_stats ON match_history.player_id = player_stats.player_id;

SELECT player_name, weapon_name, quantity FROM player_inventory JOIN weapon_stats ON player_inventory.weapon_id = weapon_stats.weapon_id JOIN player_stats ON player_inventory.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT player_name, rank_position, rank_date FROM player_ranking JOIN player_stats ON player_ranking.player_id = player_stats.player_id ORDER BY rank_date DESC LIMIT 5;
